name: CoolSo Technology Inc.
description: Developer of a gesture technology intended to focus on muscle biosensors integrating augmented reality and virtual reality. The company's technology recognizes detailed information such as muscle fatigue, gesture, and strength level, enabling clients to get wearable gesture control and rehabilitation remedies.
one_liner: Developer of a gesture technology intended to focus on muscle biosensors integrating augmented reality and virtual reality. The company's technology recognizes detailed information such as muscle fatigue, gesture, and strength level, enabling clients to get wearable gesture control and rehabilitation remedies.

name: Firnas Aero Inc.
description: Provider of a Drones-as-a-Service platform intended to offer inspection services using our unmanned aerial systems. The company's platform leverages artificial intelligence and utilizes aviation technology in the form of unmanned aviation vehicles for providing inspection services using their own proprietary aerial systems to overcome the risks and challenges of traditional inspection processes, enabling businesses and governments to get more accurate results and eliminate the risks associated with dangerous inspections.
one_liner: Provider of a Drones-as-a-Service platform intended to offer inspection services using our unmanned aerial systems. The company's platform leverages artificial intelligence and utilizes aviation technology in the form of unmanned aviation vehicles for providing inspection services using their own proprietary aerial systems to overcome the risks and challenges of traditional inspection processes, enabling businesses and governments to get more accurate results and eliminate the risks associated with dangerous inspections.

name: GeoGrid
description: Provider of water infrastructure technology, offering building-wide purification and predictive analytics through proprietary pipeline coating and monitoring solutions.
one_liner: Provider of water infrastructure technology, offering building-wide purification and predictive analytics through proprietary pipeline coating and monitoring solutions.

name: Siren Care, Inc.
description: Developer of a smart sock designed to continuously measure foot temperature, an early indicator of injury that may lead to ulcers. The company's smart socks continuously track foot temperature and send information to the doctor to help them track issues related to inflammation, enabling podiatrists to detect early signs of inflammation in patients at risk of developing diabetic foot ulcers.
one_liner: Developer of a smart sock designed to continuously measure foot temperature, an early indicator of injury that may lead to ulcers.
